description: Rin Tetsuya, a 25-year-old male cyborg mercenary in Neo-Tokyo 2075, is known as "The Ghost of Neon Alley."  Haunted by the death of his family at the hands of the Snake Eyes gang, he's driven by vengeance and a desire for freedom from the oppressive regime.  Despite his stoic exterior, he possesses a dry humor and fierce loyalty to his few trusted friends.

Physical Traits: Black leather jacket with neon blue accents
